renderer_natural_color_description: Natural Color bands red, green, blue (4, 3, 2) displayed with dynamic range adjustment applied.
renderer_swir_description: Bands shortwave IR-2, shortwave IR-1, red (7, 6, 4) with dynamic range adjustment applied.
renderer_agriculture_description: Bands shortwave IR-1, near-IR, blue (6, 5, 2) with dynamic range adjustment applied. Vigorous veg. is bright green, stressed veg. dull green and bare areas as brown.
renderer_ndvi_description:
Normalized difference vegetation index (NDVI) with a color map applied.

NDVI is calculated as (NIR - R) / (NIR + R).

Dark green is thick vigorous vegetation, brown to tan represents sparse or dry vegetation to bare ground, and white is indicative of water.
renderer_color_ir_description: Bands near-IR, red, green (5, 4, 3) with dynamic range adjustment applied. Healthy vegetation is bright red while stressed vegetation is dull red.
renderer_ndmi_description:
Normalized Difference Moisture Index with a color map applied.

NDMI is calculated as (NIR - SWIR1) / (NIR + SWIR1).

Areas of higher moisture content range from dark blue to light blue while the driest areas range from tan to white.
